text: “ ‘Hĩndĩ ĩrĩa andũ a bũrũri ũcio marĩũkaga mbere ya Jehova mĩthenya ya ciathĩ iria njathane, mũndũ o wothe ũrĩa ũgaatoonyera kĩhingo kĩa mwena wa gathigathini akahooe-rĩ, akiuma akoimagĩra kĩhingo gĩa gũthini; na mũndũ o wothe ũgaatoonyera kĩhingo kĩa mwena wa gũthini, akiuma akoimagĩra kĩhingo gĩa gathigathini. Gũtirĩ mũndũ ũgaacookera kĩhingo kĩrĩa atoonyeire, no mũndũ ariumagĩra kĩhingo kĩrĩa kĩngʼetheire kĩu atoonyeire.
